Reviews.Title: Great Great Great
Reviews.Author: Johnnie J
Reviews.Content: I am using it to post this review.This is my first laptop, the learning curve easing up and I am getting use to using a keyboard to do everything.I'm not a computer guru or familiar with laptops in general but do have a fair amount of knowledge in everyday computing needs and desires. I like to test software functionality on and armature diy status.It is fast, reliable, fun and has enough goodies to keep me occupied for a long time to come.Not sure if any of this helps but if you understand the specs you know what you are getting.I have had No Problems with this unit but have only had it for a week or so, purchased refurbished.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitiude E6410 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Ross Wilber "IT Guy"
Reviews.Content: Very nice laptop, solid construction, great condition, but it came with Windows 7 HP instead of 7 Professional, but after talking with the seller, they sent me the 7 Professional disk and I installed it without much of a hassle.  The laptop is very fast, but even faster after installing a Solid State Drive.

Reviews.Title: Worked well
Reviews.Author: Avg Joe "Bill"
Reviews.Content: We bought half a dozen of these refurbed. Most worked perfectly. One had a stuck key ($25 fix to replace keyboard) and the other a dying battery ($36 fix). Not bad at all.

Reviews.Title: Super nice.
Reviews.Author: Don B Yates
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic laptop for the money. I love it! The condition was very good, only a minor spot or two. Overall, 2 thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Dell E6410 notebook
Reviews.Author: ajmidd
Reviews.Content: This is a very fast computer. I like how it came, it was prompt. I personally don't like when I buy a computer an its loaded with software. Well this one only comes with win 7 pro 32 bit. Well built machine, worth the buy.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase would definitely buy from seller again
Reviews.Author: Derrick S.
Reviews.Content: - Fast shipping and laptop came in very good condition- Extremely happy with the purchase and will definitely buy from again!- Laptop runs great very fast with the quad core i5 and I love how easy it is to upgrade parts on this model- Also seller is very helpful when it comes to questions or concerns regarding product, great communication!

Reviews.Title: Good value for an off lease Refurb
Reviews.Author: Scott Gardner "Comm Engineer"
Reviews.Content: Seems to be pretty well built.  Fresh copy of WIndows 7 Professional.  Works good.  I wanted the i5 as we will load adobe Photoshop/Acrobat/Dreamweaver on it.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop, keyboard seems to have some issues but for now they worked them selves out.
Reviews.Author: Elliott M. Crane
Reviews.Content: The system itself is clean and came with the original disc and a good battery. The power adapter was breaking apart on the end but I had another. (Standard Dell Laptop Power Supply)My bigger issue was that the Shift Key's just didn't work, I had not even noticed the back lighting was not working until I push one of the shift keys rather hard and suddenly it started working and the back light came on. Almost like the connector was not all the way in but I could find no proof of that. It leaves me uneasy on wither or not the system will continue working or give me issues again.The laptop itself seems more than powerful enough and had no really wear to speak of besides very minor scratches on the top as described. I really with the Keyboard didn't leave me so concerned on if it will keep working for me or not.

Reviews.Title: not good refurbished
Reviews.Author: Rene
Reviews.Content: it was suposed to a refurbished but it seems its just used computer with heavy wear and tear. but overall its just ok.

Reviews.Title: Money well spent!
Reviews.Author: juneman65
Reviews.Content: I chose this laptop because I was looking for a speedy computer at a reasonable price. The majority of the reviews on Amazon were positive so I figured it was worth the modest expense to give it a try. I am very happy that I did. This laptop came loaded with windows 7 pro. 64bit which is perfect for handling image editing and 3d modeling software without getting bogged down.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Rameech McCormack
Reviews.Content: The item came in on time. Little marks here and there but that is to be expected. It's a great computer it's fast and work. Need to complete a bios memory test to make sure there are no issues.

Reviews.Title: My computer
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Salter
Reviews.Content: This computer does everything I need with ease :) may not be for everyone but it is for me. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted, on time.
Reviews.Author: Lisa S.
Reviews.Content: I know this was a refurb but they could have cleaned up the keyboard better.  Other than that, I'm extremely happy with my product and service!

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude E6410
Reviews.Author: RL
Reviews.Content: This notebook came in mint condition. Excellent for a used notebook. Bought this notebook to replace my old Toshiba laptop. The difference in speed is night and day. It did not come with the built in webcam as promised but the seller gave me an HD USB camera instead. Has plenty of disc space at 320 GB. I had the operating system changed from Windows 7 Pro 32 bit to Windows 7 Pro 64 bit without extra charge.

Reviews.Title: bought me a used laptop that could run my elgato capture card
Reviews.Author: Ps3 player
Reviews.Content: so i bought me this laptop so i can use my elgato and it does work has the specs to run so no need to buy yourself a top of the line windows or mac for that. so far been a day i had this and going to buy me sony vega on here 12 i believe to help me with the video editing. of course i used this machine to surft the web but this computer is a must for save money on your pocketmore review after i get  my sony vega 12 basic edition and months to come thanks

Reviews.Title: like it for the most part...
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Kaul
Reviews.Content: I like the Dell, it arrived a day after the last expected shipping date, which would have been no big deal, other than rescheduling my work around the last anticipated day and then extending that. But I got the delivery and it is a very nice computer...the sound is AWFULL. Turned all the way up, it can barely be heard from 2 feet away. And although these have cameras, this one doesn't work. Contacted the seller who said that this "particular computer doesn't have a camera...it does, just doesn't work. When asked about the sound, they said they were sorry if I was disappointed, and that I could send it back for a refund, but I don't want to be without a computer (I use it for my real estate business), and the sound & camera would be nice, but I thought that it was a simple enough request to send  me a usb camera and speaker or instruct me as to how I could try to improve/fix the audio/video on this one. Long story short, the laptop works fine and I really like it. It would be nice if I had an instruction book as I have never owned a Dell, but finding info online is not that difficult. I am grateful for the computer at a much lower price than new, and hope that it holds up for a very long time. Overall, I would order another from this seller, but ask them to verify that the onboard camera and sound are in good working order.
